ComicInfo.Summary:
Last episodes for Disaster 1990, Captain Klep and the original run of ABC Warriors, this prog.
Cover: Carlos Ezquerra (Alien text story)
Judge Dredd - The Great Plasteen Disaster (John Wagner - John Cooper - Tom Frame)Black Hawk (part 12) (Alan Grant - Massimo Belardinelli - Peter Knight)ABC Warriors - George (part 3 - final part) (Pat Mills - Mick McMahon - Peter Knight)The Mind of Wolfie Smith - Night of the Carnivore (part 8) (Tom Tully - Vanyo - John Aldrich)Disaster 1990 (part 21 - final part) (Gerry Finley-Day - Mike White - Tom Frame)Captain Klep (part 5 - final part) (Dave Angus - unknown)
